Oct. 4, 1948 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
A Downland Suite
Kogarah, New South Wales, Australia 3 bands played.
Quickstep March included in grand total.
The 3 judges gave individual points and were totaled together for each of the on stage events ( Test ; Own Choice and Hymn )
